premise_source_doc_sentence: Sharon Yvonne Stone  (  born March 10 , 1958  )  is an American actress , film producer , and former fashion model .

claim: Sharon Stone starred in a movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Stone first came to attention for her role in the miniseries War and Remembrance  (  1989  )  and early mainstream prominence followed with her part in Paul Verhoeven 's Total Recall  (  1990  )  .

claim: Sharon Stone starred in a movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: She became a sex symbol and rose to international recognition with her starring role as Catherine Tramell in another Verhoeven film , the erotic thriller Basic Instinct  (  1992  )  , for which she received her first Golden Globe Award nomination for Best Actress in a Motion Picture -- Drama .

claim: Sharon Stone starred in a movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: She won the Golden Globe Award and was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance in Martin Scorsese 's Casino  (  1995  )  .

claim: Sharon Stone starred in a movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: She received another two Golden Globe Award nominations for her roles in The Mighty  (  1998  )  and The Muse  (  1999  )  .

claim: Sharon Stone starred in a movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Named Officer of the Order of Arts and Letters in France in 2005 , Stone 's other notable film roles include Sliver  (  1993  )  , The Specialist  (  1994  )  , The Quick and the Dead  (  1995  )  , If These Walls Could Talk 2  (  2000  )  , Catwoman  (  2004  )  , Broken Flowers  (  2005  )  , Alpha Dog  (  2006  )  , Bobby  (  2006  )  , Lovelace  (  2013  )  , and Fading Gigolo  (  2013  )  .

claim: Sharon Stone starred in a movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Stone has made guest-appearances in The Practice  (  2004  )  , winning the Emmy Award for Outstanding Guest Actress in a Drama Series , and in Law & Order : Special Victims Unit  (  2010  )  .

claim: Sharon Stone starred in a movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: She starred in the short-lived series Agent X  (  2015  )  .

claim: Sharon Stone starred in a movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: American actress Sharon Stone has won 10 awards from 41 nominations , including one Emmy Award , one Golden Globe Award , and two MTV Movie Awards .

claim: Sharon Stone starred in a movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: She guest starred as an attorney who believes she can communicate with God in The Practice  (  1997 -- 2004  )  , a role that earned her the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Guest Actress in a Drama Series .

premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1992 , Sawyer worked with Sharon Stone on `` Where Sleeping Dogs Lie , '' which was the first of twenty feature films on which they would work together .
